description: Lexicographically earliest sequence such that no subset sums to a prime.
comments: This set was defined by T. W. A. Baumann for The Prime Puzzles and Problems pages. He and C. Rivera obtained the first 10 members. Chris Nash proved that this sequence is infinite.
crossrefs: Cf. A128687 (restricted to odd numbers), A128688 (restricted to even numbers).
author: _Carlos Rivera_, Mar 07 2000
extensions: One more term from _T. D. Noe_, Mar 20 2007
New name from _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jan 13 2014
